example.code: PS C:\>(Get-IAMGroup -GroupName MyTestGroup).Users | Remove-IAMUserFromGroup -GroupName MyTestGroup -Force PS C:\>Remove-IAMGroup -GroupName MyTestGroup -Force
example.description: This example deletes the IAM group named MyTestGroup. The first command removes any IAM users that are members of the group, and the second command deletes the IAM group. Both commands work without any prompts for confirmation.
